entry.title: Path Update
entry.content:
Path via iTunes Store:

Muting: Now you can easily mute any moment that you’re tagged in. And, we want you to have even more control â€” change your settings so only your friends can tag you in moments.

Bagi yang sering kena tag berjamaah, kini kalian bisa bernapas lega.

entry.title: Apple Watch Website Update
entry.content:
Macstories:

The Watch microsite has been updated with more details for timekeeping and fitness features, revealing more details about customizable complications, watch faces, fitness and activity tracking, and more.
